flamesdev.neon.critical

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • flamesdev.neon.critical.GameSettings

  • public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores data about the game's settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSettings

        public GameSettings(java.lang.String title,
                    boolean fullscreen,
                    boolean undecorated,
                    boolean maximize,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    double tickRate,
                    int buffers)
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the window
        fullscreen - whether the window should be fullscreen
        undecorated - whether the window should be decorated
        maximize - whether the window should be maximized
        width - the width of the window in pixels
        height - the height of the window in pixels
        tickRate - the number of ticks per second
        buffers - the number of buffer frames
